definition: see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: I am Warchief of the Horde, he said proudly.
sentences.chinese: 我是霜狼氏族的酋长，他骄傲地说。

sentences.english: It reveals the democratic constitution of the gens.
sentences.chinese: 这一点反映了氏族的民主制度。

sentences.english: So he went instead to Scotland and there founded our clan.
sentences.chinese: 所以他转而来到了苏格兰，创立了我们氏族。

sentences.english: They lived in eaves in very small ' elan'groups.
sentences.chinese: 他们生活在非常小的氏族群体的屋檐之下。

sentences.english: These myths reflect the understanding of ancient people in primitive dances.
sentences.chinese: 可见它原来也是氏族社会中的原始舞蹈。

sentences.english: In the maternal society, the basic economic unit is the family economy.
sentences.chinese: 母系氏族社会最基本的经济单位是“家户经济”。

sentences.english: Cho'Gall and the Twilight Hammer clan are destroyed by Doomhammer.
sentences.chinese: 仇高与夜锤氏族被毁灭之锤消灭。

sentences.english: Such were the rights and privileges of a typical Indian gens .
sentences.chinese: 典型的印第安人氏族的职能就是这样。

sentences.english: As vampirism spread they began to organize themselves into clans.
sentences.chinese: 作为吸血鬼的传播，他们开始氏族组织到自己。

sentences.english: All the male members of the gens were equally eligible .
sentences.chinese: 凡是本氏族的男性成员都具有同等的被选资格。

sentences.english: Yangshao culture is matriarchal clan commune system during the cultural prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 仰韶文化属于母系氏族公社制繁荣时期的文化。

sentences.english: Silver Fang septs are scattered across the Garou Nation.
sentences.chinese: 银牙氏族散布于整个狼人世界。

sentences.english: The Baze clan is legendary in horse racing.
Some believed that fish was the totem of Banpo primitives.
sentences.chinese: 有人推测这可能是半坡氏族崇奉的图腾。

sentences.english: These mutual right of inheritance strengthened the autonomy of the gens .
sentences.chinese: 这些相互继承遗产的权利加强了氏族的自决权。

sentences.english: Gamorreans live in clans, and these clans are the basis for their wars.
sentences.chinese: 加莫人以氏族为社会单位，相互征战。

definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
branch or subdivision of a family
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
